Plot: Agent 007 and the Japanese secret service ninja force must find and stop the true culprit of a series of spacejackings before nuclear war is provoked.
Title: You Only Live Twice
Writer: Harold Jack Bloom (additional story material), Roald Dahl (screenplay)
Actors: Sean Connery, Akiko Wakabayashi, Mie Hama, Tetsurô Tanba
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
